channel.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
channel.description: World News: TOI brings the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.

image.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: Donald Trump to meet PM Modi amid Quad summit: What's on agenda
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to visit the US from September 21 to 23 for the 4th Quad summit. Although an official meeting with Donald Trump is not listed, PM Modi will engage with key stakeholders in India-US relations. He will address both the Indian community and the United Nations General Assembly during his visit.
item.dc:creator: TOI News Desk

item.title: Watch: Brazil mayoral debate spirals out of control after candidate throws chair at rival
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Who is Sarah Huckabee Sanders? Arkansas governor slammed for 'shaming' Kamala Harris
item.description: Governor Sarah Huckabee Sanders criticized Vice President Kamala Harris during a campaign event for Donald Trump in Michigan. Sanders shared an anecdote about her children keeping her humble, contrasting it with Harris. She also criticized Harris's performance on issues like the southern border and inflation, emphasizing the importance of the next presidential election for America's future.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'He was so nice to me ...': Trump reveals what Biden & Kamala said after 2nd assassination attempt
item.description: Donald Trump disclosed that President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris made supportive calls after a second assassination attempt on him. The gunman was discovered at Trump's golf club in West Palm Beach. Both leaders condemned the violence, but Trump accused them of inciting attacks through their rhetoric, linking it to their political statements.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: North Korea test-fires missiles toward eastern seas amid nuclear expansion plans
item.description: North Korea's latest ballistic missile tests have escalated tensions with the US and neighbouring countries. The missiles were launched from an area north of Pyongyang, travelling approximately 400 kilometres. South Korea and Japan confirmed the launches, condemning them as a threat to regional stability. Kim Jong Un aims to rapidly expand North Korea's nuclear arsenal.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Fake Kamala hit-and-run story work of Russian propaganda group: Microsoft
item.description: Microsoft disclosed that a video falsely alleging Kamala Harris was involved in a hit-and-run is Russian propaganda. The video, shared by a fabricated news channel, seeks to influence US public opinion ahead of the presidential election. This demonstrates continued foreign efforts to manipulate American political views.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 5 women writers in Booker's final six, a first in its 55-year history
item.description: The shortlist for the 2024 Booker Prize has been revealed, featuring six titles including Rachel Kushner's 'Creation Lake' and Percival Everett's 'James.' This year marks the highest number of women authors in the prize’s history. The winner will be announced on November 12 and awarded £50,000.

item.title: Canada PM Justin Trudeau may face pressure to quit after key poll loss
item.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's Liberal Party experienced a major defeat by losing a long-held Montreal parliament seat to the Bloc Quebecois in a special election. This is their second significant loss within three months, indicating declining support for the Liberals ahead of the next general election, expected by spring 2025. Trudeau has vowed to lead his party.

item.title: Kate Middleton returns to royal duties after completing cancer treatment
item.description: Kate Middleton is back to royal duties following the completion of her cancer treatment. She attended a meeting at Windsor Castle for the Early Years campaign. Recently, she announced in a video that she had finished chemotherapy and described the last nine months as very tough for her family. Prince William was away on another engagement.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Dhaka on Hasina's stay in Delhi: 'Everything doesn't go by law'
item.description: Bangladesh's interim government announced that former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina is residing in India after her diplomatic passport was revoked. Her attempts to seek asylum elsewhere have been unsuccessful. Additionally, the government has granted magistracy powers to army officers for two months due to slow progress in improving law and order.

item.title: 'Serial abuser': Sean 'Diddy' Combs denied bail in sex trafficking case
item.description: Sean 'Diddy' Combs has been denied bail in Manhattan federal court, facing charges of racketeering conspiracy and sex trafficking. Prosecutors accuse him of leading a decade-long criminal operation involving drug-fueled sex shows and obstructing justice. They argue he poses an extreme danger to the community. Combs pleaded not guilty.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Melania Trump spotted in New York, Eric had to walk for stepmother's enhanced security
item.description: Melania Trump was seen with doubled security in New York after a second assassination attempt on Donald Trump. According to a New York Post report, Melania's departure from Trump Tower coincided with the arrival of her stepson Eric Trump. But as the 56th Street was completely closed for Melania's security, Eric had to get out of his car at the 56th and 5th Avenue and walk around 40 feet to the side entrance.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 1,000 bottles of baby oil seized from Diddy's 'freak off' den. Internet calls it disgusting
item.description: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested and charged with sex trafficking. The indictment alleges he organized extended sex sessions with male prostitutes forcing women to participate in them for days -- often recording them. Authorities found significant amounts of baby oil, drugs, and illegal firearms during raids on his properties.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Kimberly Guilfoyle probably didn't know about Bettina...': Donald Trump Jr's love life on radar
item.description: A recent photo of Donald Trump Jr kissing Bettina Anderson has fueled speculation regarding his engagement to Kimberley Guilfoyle. Insiders indicate that Guilfoyle might be unaware or in denial about the relationship. Bettina, a Florida socialite, is often seen with Don Jr, raising questions about their closeness and future plans.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Two Hindu girls 'abducted' in Pakistan's Sindh province, community demands protection
item.description: In Pakistan's Sindh province, two Hindu girls were recently abducted from their homes, sparking demands for safeguards against frequent kidnappings and forced conversions. Community leaders highlight the lack of police cooperation and broader discrimination issues affecting minorities like Ahmadis. These incidents underscore the urgent need for better protection and justice.

item.title: Billie Eilish and her brother endorse Kamala Harris: 'Vote like you life depends on it'
item.description: Billie Eilish and her brother Finneas endorsed Kamala Harris and Tim Walz on National Voter Registration Day, urging people to register and vote early. They stress the importance of voting to protect reproductive freedom, the environment, and democracy. This significant endorsement follows Taylor Swift's support for Harris and Walz. "Vote like your life depends on it because it does," Billie said.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Exploding pagers rock Lebanon: Several dead and thousands injured
item.description: Exploding pagers rock Lebanon: Several dead and thousands injured in simultaneous blasts

item.title: Diddy and Donald's photo viral as Sean charged with sex trafficking: 'Why all Trump's friends...'
item.description: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested on charges of racketeering, sex trafficking, and transportation for prostitution. Viral images show him with Donald Trump, leading to social media discussions. The indictment reveals disturbing details of forced and recorded sexual activities. Some Republicans erroneously linked Kamala Harris to Diddy sharing Kamala Harris' video with Montel Williams.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Pager explosions in Lebanon: What are these devices that have caused wave of blasts
item.description: A wave of pager explosions in Lebanon has resulted in eight deaths and over 2,700 injuries. The blasts primarily impacted Hezbollah members, raising suspicions of Israeli involvement. Authorities are investigating potential causes such as overheating batteries or advanced technology. Hospitals remain on high alert while treating numerous critically injured individuals.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Donald Trump vs Kamala polls latest: 1 in 5 Republicans thinks Harris won debate
item.description: Morning Consult polls conducted after the ABC News presidential debate on September 10 gave a 6-point lead to Kamala Harris over Donald Trump. ​The pollsters surveyed 11,022 likely US voters from September 13-15. A majority of likely voters — including 1 in 5 Republicans — believe Harris won the debate, and performance appears to be crystalizing her national lead over the former president
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
